full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` DAM CAN RDOR LEGS KYI DAR COG MA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(BAN CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA'O, ,DAM CAN RDOR LEGS RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG SER PO CHEN PO GANG 'DOD KYIS DAR COG KHYAD PAR @002B DU KHA DOG NI TSE DANG BSOD NAMS RGYAS PAR SOGS PON SOGS CHED DU SER BA'O, GOR KHA BYAD KHA CHED TU NAG ,CHOMS SKUN SHAR CHED DMAR, MI KHA DANG MI NOR ZAS GSUM CHE TUD DKAR BA'O BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
